008 *******************************************************************************/
009package Ch08_BinaryRegions;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.requestSampleImage;
013
014import ij.ImagePlus;
015import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
016import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
017import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
018import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
019import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
020import imagingbook.common.image.Projection;
021import imagingbook.core.plugin.IjPluginName;
022import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
023
024/**
025 * <p>
026 * This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the calculation of horizontal and vertical
027 * projections from a grayscale image. See Sec. 8.7 of [1] for additional
028 * details. The input image is not assumed binary, i.e., gray values are simply
029 * added up without thresholding. This plugin only works for 8-bit grayscale
030 * images, the original image is not modified. The resulting projections are
031 * shown as separate diagrams, which either show the relative amount of white
032 * (default) or black, selectable in the user dialog:
033 * </p>
034 * <ul>
035 * <li>The <em>horizontal</em> projection diagram has the same height as the
036 * original image and user-adjustable width, with diagram bars being drawn from
037 * left to right.</li>
038 * <li>The <em>vertical</em> projection diagram has the same width as the
039 * original image and user-adjustable height, with diagram bars being drawn from
040 * top to bottom.</li>
041 * </ul>
042 * <p>
043 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic
044 * Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
045 * </p>
046 * 
047 * @author WB
048 * @version 2020/12/17
049 * @version 2022/09/29 revised to match book examples
050 * 
051 * @see imagingbook.common.image.Projection
052 */
053@IjPluginName("Make Projections")
054public class Make_Projections implements PlugInFilter {
055        
056        /** Size of horizontal/vertical projection bars. */
057        public static int ProjectionSize = 150;
058        
059        /** Background color for projection diagrams. */
060        public static BasicAwtColor BackgroundColor = BasicAwtColor.White;
061        
062        /** Foreground value for horizontal projection. */
063        public static BasicAwtColor PlotColorH = BasicAwtColor.Green;
064        
065        /** Foreground value for vertical projection. */
066        public static BasicAwtColor PlotColorV = BasicAwtColor.Magenta;
067        
068        /** Plot the relative amount of white (false) or black (true). */
069        public static boolean ShowAmountOfBlack = false;
070        
071        private ImagePlus im = null;
072        
073        
074        /**
075         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
076         * is currently open.
077         */
078        public Make_Projections() {
079                if (noCurrentImage()) {
080                        requestSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Cat);
081                }
082        }
083        
084        @Override
085        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) { 
086                this.im = im;
087                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES; 
088        }
089        
090        @Override
091        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
092                
093                if (!runDialog()) {
094                        return;
095                }
096                
097                String title = im.getShortTitle();
098                int M = ip.getWidth();
099                int N = ip.getHeight();
100                
101                Projection proj = new Projection(ip);
102                
103                // draw the horizontal projection diagram:
104                double[] pHor = proj.getHorizontal();   // pHor[v] = sum of pixel values in row v
105                ColorProcessor hP = new ColorProcessor(ProjectionSize, N);
106                hP.setColor(BackgroundColor.getColor());
107                hP.fill();
108                hP.setColor(PlotColorH.getColor());
109                double maxWhite = M * 255;
110                for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
111                        double amount = (ShowAmountOfBlack) ?
112                                        1 - pHor[v] / maxWhite :        // amount of black in line 'v'
113                                        pHor[v] / maxWhite;                     // amount of white in line 'v'
114                        int k = (int) Math.round(amount * ProjectionSize);
115                        if (k > 0) {
116                                hP.drawLine(0, v, k, v);
117                        }
118                }       
119                (new ImagePlus(title + "-horizontal-proj", hP)).show();
120                                
121                // draw the vertical projection diagram:
122                double[] pVer = proj.getVertical();             // pVer[u] = sum of pixel values in column u
123                ColorProcessor vP = new ColorProcessor(M, ProjectionSize);
124                vP.setColor(BackgroundColor.getColor()); 
125                vP.fill();
126                vP.setColor(PlotColorV.getColor());
127                maxWhite = N * 255;
128                for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
129                        double amount = (ShowAmountOfBlack) ?
130                                        1 - pVer[u] / maxWhite :        // amount of black in column 'u'
131                                        pVer[u] / maxWhite;                     // amount of white in column 'u'
132                        int k = (int) (amount * ProjectionSize);
133                        if (k > 0) {
134                                vP.drawLine(u, 0, u, k);
135                        }
136                }
137                (new ImagePlus(title + "-vertical-proj", vP)).show();
138        }
139
140        private boolean runDialog() {
141                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
142                gd.addNumericField("Size of projection plots", ProjectionSize, 0);
143                gd.addCheckbox("Show amount of black", ShowAmountOfBlack);
144                gd.addEnumChoice("Horizontal plot color", PlotColorH);
145                gd.addEnumChoice("Vertical plot color", PlotColorV);
146                gd.addEnumChoice("Plot background color", BackgroundColor);
147                
148                gd.showDialog();
149                if (gd.wasCanceled())
150                        return false;
151                
152                ProjectionSize = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
153                ShowAmountOfBlack = gd.getNextBoolean();
154                PlotColorH = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
155                PlotColorV = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
156                BackgroundColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
157                return true;
158        }
159}
